Citation_Information.description: gdal3.js GUI is a web application that provides a gui to gdal_translate, ogr2ogr and gdal_rasterize applications to be used online. URL https://gdal3.js.org/

Service.name: gdal3.js GUI web application
Service.abstract_desc: gdal3.js is a port of Gdal applications (gdal_translate, ogr2ogr, gdal_rasterize, gdalwarp, gdaltransform) to Webassembly.
Service.supported_operating_system_note: Linux, FreeBSD, MS-Windows, Mac OS X, Android, IOS
Service.system_requirements_note: Documentation for gdal3.js is available at https://gdal3.js.org/docs/.
Service.description: gdal3.js GUI is a web application that provides a gui to gdal_translate, ogr2ogr and gdal_rasterize applications to be used online. Uses gdal3.js in the background. It runs on the browser and files are converted on the client side. gdal3.js is a port of Gdal applications (gdal_translate, ogr2ogr, gdal_rasterize, gdalwarp, gdaltransform) to Webassembly. It allows you to convert raster and vector geospatial data to various formats and coordinate systems. gdal3.js uses emscripten to compile Gdal, proj, geos, spatialite, sqlite, geotiff, tiff, webp, exfat, zlib and iconv to webassembly.
